1.title: In-law in the House
1.plot: Heather and Gord have "made due" with their hazardous eyesore of a kitchen with limited seating for far too long, but now Gord's mother is moving in and they need to make some big decisions!

2.title: Sibling Rivalry
2.plot: Niya and Drish have differing ideas about what to do with their parents' house that was given to them. Party girl Niya wants to head to the city, while emotionally attached Drish feels the place just needs some youthful inspiration.

3.title: Kitchen Catastrophe
3.plot: Hina and Paul spent many years seeing the world, but now their only view is the unsightly kitchen in their neglected home. Time to decide whether to renovate or re-locate.

4.title: Tween Management
4.plot: Things have changed at Ish and Josie's once comfortably spacious house. With two tween age kids vying for more space, the walls are closing in, prompting Ish to search for solutions.

5.title: On Hold
5.plot: Dan and Ross are getting married at home, but there's nothing to celebrate about their cramped galley style kitchen that makes entertaining near impossible. Dan has set his sights on moving, while Dan thinks they're a reno away from Â'home sweet home'.

6.title: Toddler Sprawl
6.plot: Both Shannon and Karen are in pursuit of la dolca vida, but Karen believes their house has become a detriment to their life plan. This couple would like to have another child but Karen says Â'no way' until they figure out their house issues.

7.title: Promises Promises
7.plot: Dmitri said "I do" to marriage and renovations, but six months after the wedding, the dated dÃ©cor remains an "I don't" and bride Tatiana says the honeymoon is over.

8.title: Emotional Attachment
8.plot: Uchenwa thinks the family starter house is all but finished, while her husband Dwayne is emotionally attached and thinks it still has a few good years left in it.

imdb.plot outline: Pitting property against renovation, homeowners must tackle the question of whether to remodel their existing houses or sell. Interior designer Robin Lewis uses state-of-the-art graphics to simulate a dream renovation in their current homes, while expert realtor Vanessa Roman tries to convince them to move by showing a property that perfectly matches their wish list and budget.
imdb.title: Reno vs. Relocate
plot: Pitting property against renovation, homeowners must tackle the question of whether to remodel their existing houses or sell. Interior designer Robin Lewis uses state-of-the-art graphics to simulate a dream renovation in their current homes, while expert realtor Vanessa Roman tries to convince them to move by showing a property that perfectly matches their wish list and budget.
